209  InitParameters(RESOLUTION camera_resolution_ = RESOLUTION_HD720,
210  int camera_fps_ = 0,
211  int camera_linux_id_ = 0,
212  sl::String svo_input_filename_ = sl::String(),
213  bool svo_real_time_mode_ = false,
214  DEPTH_MODE depth_mode_ = DEPTH_MODE_PERFORMANCE,
215  UNIT coordinate_units_ = UNIT_MILLIMETER,
216  COORDINATE_SYSTEM coordinate_system_ = COORDINATE_SYSTEM_IMAGE,
217  bool sdk_verbose_ = false,
218  int sdk_gpu_id_ = -1,
219  float depth_minimum_distance_ = -1.,
220  bool camera_disable_self_calib_ = false,
221  bool camera_image_flip_ = false,
222  bool enable_right_side_measure_ = false,
223  int camera_buffer_count_linux_ = 4,
224  sl::String sdk_verbose_log_file_ = sl::String(),
225  bool depth_stabilization_ = true)

227  , camera_fps(camera_fps_)

229  , svo_input_filename(svo_input_filename_)

389  class SL_SDK_EXPORT SpatialMappingParameters {
390  public:
391  typedef std::pair<float, float> interval;
392 
398  enum RESOLUTION {
399  RESOLUTION_HIGH,
400  RESOLUTION_MEDIUM,
401  RESOLUTION_LOW
402  };
403 
409  enum RANGE {
410  RANGE_NEAR,
411  RANGE_MEDIUM,
412  RANGE_FAR
413  };
414 
418  SpatialMappingParameters(RESOLUTION resolution = RESOLUTION_HIGH,
419  RANGE range = RANGE_MEDIUM,
420  int max_memory_usage_ = 2048,
421  bool save_texture_ = true,
422  bool keep_mesh_consistent_ = true,
423  bool inverse_triangle_vertices_order_ = false) {
424  max_memory_usage = max_memory_usage_;
425  save_texture = save_texture_;
426  keep_mesh_consistent = keep_mesh_consistent_;
427  inverse_triangle_vertices_order = inverse_triangle_vertices_order_;
428  set(resolution);
429  set(range);
430  }
431 
437  static float get(RESOLUTION resolution = RESOLUTION_HIGH) {
438  float resolution_m = 0.5f;
439  switch (resolution) {
440  case SpatialMappingParameters::RESOLUTION_HIGH:
441  resolution_m = 0.02f;
442  break;
443  case SpatialMappingParameters::RESOLUTION_MEDIUM:
444  resolution_m = 0.05f;
445  break;
446  case SpatialMappingParameters::RESOLUTION_LOW:
447  resolution_m = 0.08f;
448  break;
449  default:
450  resolution_m = 0.05f;
451  break;
452  }
453  return resolution_m;
454  }
455 
460  void set(RESOLUTION resolution = RESOLUTION_HIGH) {
461  resolution_meter = get(resolution);
462  }
463 
469  static float get(RANGE range = RANGE_MEDIUM) {
470  float range_max = 5.;
471  switch (range) {
472  case SpatialMappingParameters::RANGE_NEAR:
473  range_max = 3.5f;
474  break;
475  case SpatialMappingParameters::RANGE_MEDIUM:
476  range_max = 5.f;
477  break;
478  case SpatialMappingParameters::RANGE_FAR:
479  range_max = 10.f;
480  break;
481  default:
482  range_max = 5.f;
483  break;
484  }
485  return range_max;
486  }
487 
492  void set(RANGE range = RANGE_MEDIUM) {
493  range_meter.second = get(range);
494  }
495 
499  float resolution_meter = 0.03f;
500 
504  const interval allowed_resolution = std::make_pair(0.01f, 0.2f);
505 
513  interval range_meter = std::make_pair(0.7f, 5.f);
514 
518  const interval allowed_min = std::make_pair(0.3f, 10.f);
519 
523  const interval allowed_max = std::make_pair(2.f, 20.f);
524 
529  bool save_texture = true;
530 
535  bool keep_mesh_consistent = true;
536 
540  int max_memory_usage = 2048;
541 
545  bool inverse_triangle_vertices_order = false;
546 
552  bool save(sl::String filename);
553 
559  bool load(sl::String filename);
560  };
561
